RFCDE¶

The RFCDE package implements random forests for conditional density estimation.

Installation¶

RFCDE is availabile from PyPI; to install use `pip`

pip install rfcde

Currently only Python 2.7 is supported due to compilation errors with Cython in Python 3.6.

RFCDE

Random Forests for Conditional Density Estimation
